string.value: #b#eTitle Challenge - Donation King#n(Special Title)\n#kA symbol of wealth and honor that is given to one person: try out for the #e#bDonation King#k#n title! I heard they are choosing Donation Kings to represent each town. I should go see the Monk of Honor, #b#p9000040##k.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Donation King#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Time Left : #Qminlimit#Minutes #Qseclimit#Seconds
 - Donated Amount : #b#jmoney##k Mesos

 At the beginning of each month, the donation record of every town is reset. Dalair said simply donating a large amount of money will not win me this award, but he said I must demonstrate wisdom.

#b#eTitle Challenge - Donation King#n(Special Title)
#k
 - Time Left : #Qminlimit#Minutes #Qseclimit#Seconds
 - Donated Town : #b#jm##k
 - Donated Amount : #b#jmoney##k Mesos

At the beginning of each month, the donation record of every town is reset. Dalair said simply donating a large amount of money will not win me this award, but said I must demonstrate wisdom.
